fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, force someone to drink you, roleblocking them as they get sick. 3 uses before you are empty.
- You taste so awful that they begin undergoing an irreversible cell death. In 2 days they will be dealt an Unstoppable attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are hanged, your target is cured of their irreversible cell death as they regain hope.
- If someone is undergoing cell death but the game ends before they die, you also win.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have someone drink you without dying due to irreversible cell death.
